content: leaf bud chart 2 and then work two a dditional repeats of large leaf chart 3 r ows 15-24 this lovely lace weight yarn is called king by creatively dyed i used about 700 yards 640 m unfortunately the yarn is no longer available but a shawl knitted in any single-ply lace yarn that comes in skeins of about 800 yards 732 m per 100 grams would have a very similar appearance of course you can really use any lace weight yarn to achieve t he same delicate- looking shawl this original pattern is intended for personal use only reproduction or distribution of the pattern in whole or part including text charts or photographs is prohibited without my written consent all rights reserved ashton © 2015 by dee o keefe  dee okeefe@ymail com  dee o keefe designs
